page.description: The page menu allows you to select different sets of menus.

section.description: Different menus will appear or disappear, depending on the options that you select. Most of these Dependencies are determined under the Component Type page. If you click Grid is: Updateable under component type, for example, the ' Update Settings ' Page will appear under the Grid tree. However, setting your grid to this will prevent you from checking off the ' Grid contains a 'Detail View' part ' check box; that is also located on the Component Type page. Without this box checked the Detail View options, show below, will not appear under the Component Type tree menu.

case.title: Component Type
case.description: Defines the style of the grid and whether it will have search and/or detail parts.

case.title: Grid > Data Source
case.description: Defines the type of database connection that you require.

case.title: Grid > Query (DBF) Grid > Query (AlphaDAO)
case.description: Specifies the database, table, filter expression, and order expression.

case.title: Grid > Fields
case.description: Selects the fields that appear in the grid and sets their properties.

case.title: Grid > Properties
case.description: Sets properties for the grid, including style.

case.title: Grid > Update Settings
case.description: Appears if the grid is updateable. Sets add, edit, and insert properties.

case.title: Search > Fields
case.description: Selects the fields that appear in the search part and sets their properties.

case.title: Search > Properties
case.description: Sets properties for the search part.

case.title: Detail View > Fields
case.description: Selects the fields that appear in the detail view part and sets their properties.

case.title: Detail View > Properties
case.description: Sets properties for the detail view part.

case.title: Events
case.description: Allows you to create scripts to respond to grid events.

case.title: Information
case.description: Allows you to record information about the grid.
